TopicTitle: Ask a stupid question, Get a stupid answer back.

Articles.Content:
You have to have fly.

How much fly do I have?

Install one of those technical-info mods, and check your lift rating.

How do you dog?

You don't just dog. You LIVE the dog from within.

How do I build an Eve SSTO?

Just being A Damn Apple and you'll make it without even thinking about it.

How do you dodge the god dog cerberus ?

Hold the brakes, put 1st gear, hit full gas, let go of the brakes. Your Dodge should run it over good.

What's for dessert?

A big sandbox that's very delicious.

Swiggity Swag, what's in the bag?(A Shark?)

A Scooby Snack.

Why is the Sun rotating around the Earth???

Because of SCIENCE!

Why is a platypus?

Platypus is of duck.

How does the inside of a bottle stick to itself?

What?

What if Star Trek actually existed?

Well it'd be the future.

What if the Soviet Union existed in the USA while France started a war on water whilst Turkey extinguished turkeys??

The world would explode.

What if Justin Bieber was elected president?

Well, he'd be impeached with a peach. He's Canadian, and ol' Mr. Chris Hadfield is Canadian and would be a (much) better (space) president.

What if Fly = water?

Uh.... What?

Why would a 999 error be a- 99999999999 ERROR. APERTURE SCIENCE IS HAVING TECHNICAL DIFFICULTIES.

Uh.... What?

What if we actually answered our stupid questions?

I would poop.

OH GOD HELP ME THERE'S BUTNUTS IN MY EYES HELP!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Please hold on while your being redirected, this may take a week.

How many Nicholas Cages does it take to change a light bulb?

as much as it take to got a scwarzy and stallone to escape from the container boat cage ...

how to dfhdsjtjreujfoahaehzhrze without turning crazy ?

Eat a dictionary

What is a kerbal ?

Kerbal is love. Kerbal is life.

Who dunnit?

You.

Why is red called red and not green? Why are colors called the names they are called?

Because what I say, goes. Yes, I invented the names of the colors.

What would happen if I landed on the Sun IRL?

EDIT: I was going to reply to Max, but someone beat me to it.

If you landed on the Sun, I'd reply to your reply on this thread and question you about your experience about landing on the Sun!

What would happen if nobody used run-on sentences anymore?

Keyboard-repairmen would make business on repairing the "," and "." keys.

How much duck is in a carrot?

0%.

What % of NerdCubed is cubic?
